mapper.select: select brand_id, `name`, logo, `description`, show_status, first_letter, sort, create_time, update_time, deleted from leyoumall.pms_brand where brand_id = #{brandId} and deleted = 0
mapper.insert: insert into leyoumall.pms_brand(`name`, logo, `description`, show_status, first_letter, sort, create_time, update_time, deleted) values (#{name}, #{logo}, #{description}, #{showStatus}, #{firstLetter}, #{sort}, now(), now(), 0)
mapper.update: update leyoumall.pms_brand set `name` = #{name}, logo = #{logo}, `description`= #{description}, show_status = #{showStatus}, sort = #{sort}, update_time = now() where brand_id = #{brandId}
update leyoumall.pms_brand set show_status = #{showStatus}, update_time=now() where brand_id = #{brandId}
